data.name: Book of Travels - Cup of Kindness
data.detailed_description:
Buy us a Cup of Kindness and support the Book of Travels team!

This is a DLC that buys you nothing but the warm feelings of helping out… By buying a Cup of Kindness, you’re helping this ambitious team stay strong!
The whole Book of Travels adventure has been very much a community driven quest from the outset: we’re a small studio making a really big thing, and player support makes a huge difference to us. So if you like what we’re doing and you want to top up our reserves with a Cup of Kindness, buy this DLC!

We’ll owe you the gratitude of deep friendship and look forward to wholesome times ahead!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1152340/Book_of_Travels/

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780, Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980, Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X Catalina or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 5500M 8GB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X Catalina or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 5500 XT 8GB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780, Radeon RX 550
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 970 GTX, Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
